---
title: "Age-of-Onset (Survival): Main Method: Set Age"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
setage_survival = function(N, K, onset, minAge, maxAge){
  
  # set age
  born = runif(N, min=2023-maxAge, 2023-minAge)
  y = onset - born
  y[which(y>100)] = 100
  
  # return their age in years
  return(y)
  
}
```
